Body: Description: This ticket is for upgrading StealthAUDIT to latest version of Netwrix Enterprise Auditor (11.6)

Zoom meeting

pre-flight meeting

existing version: 11.5.1355.1197

 

licensed for Azure, but never setup

still isn't really interested in setting it up at this time

 

no FS or SDD

 

AIC and PR are secured

 

upgrade meeting scheduled on Wednesday, Dec. 4th, at 11AM EST

What We've Learned Updated: preflight completed

only AD
no FS or SDD

uploaded pictures to ticket
uploaded AD summary to account

upgrade meeting already scheduled for 12/04/24

Zoom meeting

plan for meeting

upgrade NEA

upgrade

 

client asking about physical servers

talking about setting up new beefy host and setup VMs on it

 

proceeding with upgrade

 

upgrades for AIC and NEA completed without issue

the only conflict was with changes to the Security Assessment report

 

had trouble getting AIC and PR to work

getting SSL error

 

turns out the old cert wasn't on the server anymore and the bindings were never changed to the new cert

deleted old bindings and bound new cert

 

AIC and PR work now

 

confirmed from application server and client's workstation

 

client asked about WeakPassoword report

it wasn't working for sometime

-the job was configured to use a non-default profile but the profile was removed

set the job to use the default profile and it works now

 

client also asked about how to tell which accounts share passwords

this is something he used to use to tell if non-privileged and privileged accounts are using the same password

 

showed him how to find it in the Weak Passwords results table

 

client happy

going to create a new ticket for the weak password issue

close both tickets

Next Steps Updated: create new ticket for weak password job error
close this ticket
